body.name: Novilla Queen Bed Frame, 14 Inch Metal Platform Bed Frame Queen Size with Storage Space Under Bed, Heavy Duty Steel Slat Support, Easy Assembly, No Box Spring Needed
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 15 hrs 18 mins
features: 【High-Quality Construction】Constructed with premium metal material, this bed frame offers exceptional durability and has a weight capacity of up to 1200 pounds, ensuring long-lasting support and stability.
【 Easy Installation】Designed for hassle-free assembly, our bed frame comes with clear instructions and all necessary tools, allowing you to set it up quickly and effortlessly.
【Noise-Free Sleeping Experience】With its sturdy construction and innovative design, our bed frame eliminates annoying squeaks and creaks, providing you with a peaceful and undisturbed night's rest.
【Under-Bed Storage Solution】Maximize your bedroom space with the convenient under-bed storage feature. The ample clearance allows you to store various items and keep your room neat and organized.
【Modern Design】Our queen size bed frame features a sleek and minimalist design with a matte black finish, adding a contemporary touch to any bedroom.
body.description: The metal bed frames have minimalist styling for a fashion favorite. It's designed with a matte black palette and utilizes heavy-duty reinforced metal rods to improve use. As a mattress foundation, no box spring needed.Novilla aims to provide a cozy and affordable home-making experience in a simple way for everyone.Dimensions： ● Twin: 75"L x 39"W x 14"H ● Full: 75"L x 54"W x 14"H ● Queen: 80"L x 60"W x 14"H ● King: 80"L x 76"W x 14"HMaximum Weight Capacity: 1200lbsTips:Please carefully read the instructions before installing the bed frame to ensure all parts and screws are securely attached for safe use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This bed is very stable.
reviews.reviewText: The stability of this bed is beyond my expectations! I have had this bed for a while now and I am still amazed by its construction and quality. First of all, its design is very exquisite, and every detail shows the manufacturer's heart. The bed frame is strong and durable and supports the mattress perfectly, allowing me to enjoy a comfortable night's sleep every night. Also, the assembly of the bed was very easy. I did it all by myself without any hassle. Overall, I am very happy with my purchase of this bed. The stability and quality of the bed makes me feel like I am worth the money. I would not hesitate to recommend this quality bed product to friends!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As described. Quiet, sturdy, and provides the support needed for a mattress. I love that I don't have to use a box spring. I appreciate how easy it is to assemble with minimal tools (which are provided). If you're looking for a reasonably priced, simple, minimalistic bed frame, this is it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product and value for money
reviews.reviewText: As i value reliability and ease of use, this frame is perfect for me. I love how easy it is to assemble the frame; it takes me almost no time at all. Its sturdy construction guarantees stability and strong support for a restful night's sleep. The fact that it is compact and lightweight makes it easy to move without sacrificing strength or durability, which is remarkable. With its combination of metal materials, user-friendliness, and long-term durability, this bed frame is a great buy for anyone if you are looking for this queen size frame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So far so good. Very sturdy bedframe. Easy to put together. I like the height. Looks good with a bedskirt underneath the mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A perfect fusion of Durability and Functionality
reviews.reviewText: I'm absolutely thrilled with this bed frame! It's a fantastic mix of durability and style – sturdy construction that keeps everything stable, plus a sleek design that fits seamlessly with any decor. Putting it together was a breeze, and the extra storage underneath is a practical touch. A top-quality pick for a comfy and functional bedroom setup!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, Stylish, and Stress-Free: The Perfect Bedframe
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame has exceeded my expectations in terms of ease of assembly and overall value for money. The bed frame is a top-notch choice for those seeking an easy-to-assemble, sturdy, and budget-friendly option. I was able to assemble the entire bedframe on my own in under an hour. I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a reliable bedframe without compromising on style.
